languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс закрывает глаза с таким видом, словно сдерживается от потока грязной брани. Потом с шипением выпускает воздух сквозь сжатые зубы.{/n} "Весьма".

traits.locale_text: {n}Хейнрикс закрывает глаза с таким видом, словно сдерживается от потока грязной брани. Потом с шипением выпускает воздух сквозь сжатые зубы.{/n} "Весьма".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix closes his eyes, his expression that of someone holding back a wave of harsh profanity. Then he hisses out a breath through clenched teeth.{/n} "Worse."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс закрывает глаза с таким видом, словно сдерживается от потока грязной брани. Потом с шипением выпускает воздух сквозь сжатые зубы.{/n} "Весьма".

languages.text: {n}海因里希闭上了眼睛，仿佛是硬生生地忍住了一大串刺耳的脏话。随后，他紧咬牙关，吐了一口气。{/n}“非常糟糕。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix closes his eyes, his expression that of someone holding back a wave of harsh profanity. Then he hisses out a breath through clenched teeth.{/n} "Worse."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希闭上了眼睛，仿佛是硬生生地忍住了一大串刺耳的脏话。随后，他紧咬牙关，吐了一口气。{/n}“非常糟糕。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix closes his eyes, his expression that of someone holding back a wave of harsh profanity. Then he hisses out a breath through clenched teeth.{/n} "Worse."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix cierra los ojos con expresión de estar conteniendo una retahíla de obscenidades. Después, sisea una palabra entre sus dientes apretados:{/n} «Peor».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix closes his eyes, his expression that of someone holding back a wave of harsh profanity. Then he hisses out a breath through clenched teeth.{/n} "Worse."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix cierra los ojos con expresión de estar conteniendo una retahíla de obscenidades. Después, sisea una palabra entre sus dientes apretados:{/n} «Peor».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは目を閉じ、厳しい冒涜の波が押し寄せるのをこらえているような表情を浮かべた。そして、歯を食いしばって息を吐き出した。{/n}「最悪だ」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix closes his eyes, his expression that of someone holding back a wave of harsh profanity. Then he hisses out a breath through clenched teeth.{/n} "Worse."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは目を閉じ、厳しい冒涜の波が押し寄せるのをこらえているような表情を浮かべた。そして、歯を食いしばって息を吐き出した。{/n}「最悪だ」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix schließt die Augen. Seine Miene ist die eines Mannes, der mit Mühe eine Flut rüder Schimpfworte zurückhält. Dann stößt er durch zusammengepresste Zähne einen zischenden Atemzug aus.{/n} "Schlimmer."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix closes his eyes, his expression that of someone holding back a wave of harsh profanity. Then he hisses out a breath through clenched teeth.{/n} "Worse."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix schließt die Augen. Seine Miene ist die eines Mannes, der mit Mühe eine Flut rüder Schimpfworte zurückhält. Dann stößt er durch zusammengepresste Zähne einen zischenden Atemzug aus.{/n} "Schlimmer."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix ferme les yeux et inspire profondément comme pour se retenir de lâcher un chapelet de jurons.{/n} « Pire encore, » {n}finit-il par dire dans un souffle sans desserrer les dents.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix closes his eyes, his expression that of someone holding back a wave of harsh profanity. Then he hisses out a breath through clenched teeth.{/n} "Worse."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix ferme les yeux et inspire profondément comme pour se retenir de lâcher un chapelet de jurons.{/n} « Pire encore, » {n}finit-il par dire dans un souffle sans desserrer les dents.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, gözlerini kapatıyor. Ağır küfürler savurmamak için kendini zor tuttuğu her hâlinden belli oluyor. Sonra dişlerini sıkarak tıslarcasına nefes veriyor.{/n} "Daha kötü."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix closes his eyes, his expression that of someone holding back a wave of harsh profanity. Then he hisses out a breath through clenched teeth.{/n} "Worse."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix, gözlerini kapatıyor. Ağır küfürler savurmamak için kendini zor tuttuğu, her hâlinden belli oluyor. Sonra dişlerini sıkarak tıslarcasına nefes veriyor.{/n} "Daha kötü."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
